website_summaries.verdict: Designed and created in collaboration with professional skateboarder Caswell Berry, this shoe from Osiris provides the perfect mix of board feel and durability. Its simple yet stylish design makes this shoe suitable for streetwear as well. The Osiris Caswell VLC also has several features that enhance support, comfort, and fit. And because of its superior quality and functionality, it’s no longer surprising to see skateboarders and sneakerheads wearing this shoe on the streets, skate parks, and just about anywhere else.
pros: Most reviewers agree that the Osiris Caswell VLC is comfortable enough for everyday wear
The vulcanized outsole of this shoe provides excellent board feel, according to some users
Several wearers mention that this shoe is very breathable
A few purchasers are satisfied with the arch support of this kick
Many consumers find the Osiris Caswell VLC to be very attractive
Plenty of those who own this shoe appreciate its excellent workmanship
A lot of buyers say that this sneaker is worth every penny
Some are willing to buy more than 1 pair of the Osiris Caswell VLC
The design of this shoe is perfect for skateboarding, a couple of comments have mentioned
cons: A lot of people complain about the tight fit of the Osiris Caswell VLC
One person notices that the laces of this shoe seem shorter than usual

customer_reviews.title: I bought the shoes and never took a good look at them til about a month
customer_reviews.text: On one of the shoes.The eyelets were about 1" higher than the other eyelets on the other side of the shoe. I bought the shoes and never took a good look at them til about a month later
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. I love shoes that don't use leather, and the material was good quality. I would definitely buy again. Black on white goes with everything, I think it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MsChris

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son is really picky about his shoes. He loved these, they have a good arch, and the heel is padded very well. They are attractive and well made. I am looking to buy another pair for my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes but not for me
customer_reviews.text: When i seen these shoes at first i liked them. But once i seen them on feet i didn't like the way they looked. But other then that the shoes are nice but just not for me
customer_reviews.author: Sad-Girl 909

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for your feets!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son who, somehow, wears the same size shoes I do. He likes them and they fit his feet well enough. That's all one could hope for 15 dollar shoes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and says they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TERRI L JACQUES

customer_reviews.title: great quality, and good comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fast arrival, great quality, and good comfort. I would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristoper Krucky

customer_reviews.title: and these are the best shoes I have found for the job
customer_reviews.text: I work in an animal shelter, and these are the best shoes I have found for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe, but a little warm
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is they are a little warm your foot cant breath much in these. other then that worth every penny and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: james frost

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Osiris shoes and love their style and comfort. I ordered 1/2 size larger than usual for a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kuchera

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable shoes but they are a little wide on me
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable shoes but they are a little wide on me. The length fits me perfectly but just a little wide.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Caswell VLC
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe quality, the fabric looks fantastic and the overall build quality is great. Shoelaces were a bit short in my opinion but aside from that no probs. Very confortable shoes, I use them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size. Go one higher. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for size. Go one higher. Had to pay 20 bucks shipping and a restocking fee of 10. Avoid if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn T.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good. weird feeling though
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to break in. But I'm hoping I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Reese

customer_reviews.title: fit true to US sizing
customer_reviews.text: they fit truer to size, but according to sizing chart they run a size to size 1/2 larger. so buy true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These suckers are ugly
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are well made, very good design for skating. They are also freakin huge (vertically) and so ugly I will be returning them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Not Like it Looks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these like a week ago and was excited to get them but I opened the box and they looked nothing like the picture. They were ugly as hell and fit super weird partially because when you fix the laces to the width of your foot and the laces are almost touching the laces on the other side. I was very disappointed and will be returning them this week
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

product_meta.title: Osiris Men's Caswell VLC Skateboarding Shoes
product_meta.description: This skate shoe from Osiris features a seamless toe and a lightly padded tongue and collar.
feature_bullets: This skate shoe from Osiris features a seamless toe and a lightly padded tongue and collar.
Material Composition: Suede and mesh upper materials
